mapper.insert: INSERT INTO upload ( uploadTitle, uploadContent, uploadFileName, uploadFileRealName, uploadFileSize, uploadWriter, uploadDate, uploadFlag ) VALUES ( #{uploadTitle}, #{uploadContent}, #{uploadFileName}, #{uploadFileRealName}, #{uploadFileSize}, 'Admin', NOW(), #{uploadFlag} )
mapper.select: SELECT uploadIdx, uploadTitle, uploadContent, uploadFileName, uploadFileRealName, uploadFileSize, uploadWriter, uploadDate, uploadFlag FROM upload WHERE uploadFlag = 'OR' ORDER BY uploadIdx DESC
